articles.author: Louis Westendarp
articles.title: Hard at work? Serbian MP resigns after watching porn during Kosovo debate - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Zvonimir Stević was the chair of the Serbian parliament’s ‘Committee for Kosovo.’
articles.content:
A Serbian MP for the Socialist Party on Tuesday resigned from his parliamentary position after he was caught watching pornography during a debate on Kosovo.
A video filmed during the debate showed a… [+1487 chars]

articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Brexit was a ‘colossal mistake’, former UK prime minister John Major tells committee - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The former British prime minister said he is not a ‘significant Europhile’ but believes the UK was stronger in the European Union
